title: New: Azealia Banks – No Problems (Produced By MachineDrum)
body:
Well that didn’t take long.

Following their “Twitter beef” and [Angel Haze putting out a diss track](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18938-new-angel-haze-on-the-edge/) aimed at **Azealia Banks**, the NY rapper has replied in the only way that she knows how to; through music. Produced by **Machinedrum**, it’s quite possibly the best track she’s done since 212, so ya know, keep the beef coming, eh? Going far harder, and far more personal than Haze, Banks shows that despite a relatively disappointing 2012, the girl still has a bit of fight in her. Of course, the fact that she’s managed to get Machinedrum in to produce a track of such quality in a mere matter of hours doesn’t point to a PR stunt at all….
